definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

lit. secondary foreigner/(derogatory term for Chinese Christians and others associated with foreigners, used at the time of the Boxer Rebellion)/(coll.) westernized Chinese person/(derog.) person of mixed Chinese and Russian blood/(slang) Ukraine/German shepherd dog/(dialect) two-year-old goat

sentences.english: That's what an ordinary returned student can appreciate, the poetry of the ehr-mao-tzu.
sentences.chinese: 這是普通留學生所能欣賞的二毛子舊詩。

sentences.english: He no soon immigrated the United States than a Russian army fan had gotten a not bad work.
sentences.chinese: 話說有一老毛子軍迷剛移民美國，找了份不錯的工作。

sentences.english: Everybody in the office had been so busy that nobody had paid attention to the Russian's absence.
sentences.chinese: 因爲工作繁忙，沒人注意到當天辦公室裏少了老毛子。

definition: devils/refers to 日本鬼子, wartime term insult for Japanese

lit. secondary foreigner/(derogatory term for Chinese Christians and others associated with foreigners, used at the time of the Boxer Rebellion)/(coll.) westernized Chinese person/(derog.) person of mixed Chinese and Russian blood/(slang) Ukraine/German shepherd dog/(dialect) two-year-old goat
soldier (from the two components of the 兵 character) (derog.)
Katyusha (name)/name of a Russian wartime song/nickname of a rocket launcher used by the Red Army in WWII
person speaking with a foreign accent
